definition: to make a fire/to light a fire
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 魚生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: Chuck Norris can light a fire by rubbing two ice-cubes together.
sentences.chinese: 羅禮士可以摩擦兩塊冰塊生火。

sentences.english: But we have a fire until June.
sentences.chinese: 但我們到六月還要生火。

sentences.english: Stoke the fire, break out the silver, wake the china.
sentences.chinese: 快生火，拿出銀器，叫醒瓷碟。

sentences.english: One of them is to use an electric fire starter.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的一個人是用一個電熱爐生火。

sentences.english: Snow leaves, we will hold some fire heat, flames Wang Wang's.
sentences.chinese: 下雪了我們就抱些樹葉生火取暖，火苗旺旺的。

sentences.english: Usually ya stove is set before a window, with good hard charcoal burning.
sentences.chinese: 茶爐大都置在窗前，用硬炭生火。

sentences.english: Be careful when you start a fire.
sentences.chinese: 當你生火時一定要小心。

sentences.english: had a race to make fire and make s'mores between like the teams in our class.
sentences.chinese: 班裏分成幾隊，然後比賽誰能最快生火與做果塔餅乾。

sentences.english: Lighting fires to create a smoke screen is an ancient ruse in military tactics.
sentences.chinese: 生火製造煙幕，是古老的戰爭詭術。

sentences.english: Wood from fruit trees makes good fuel for your fire.
sentences.chinese: 生火的木料最好是用果木。

sentences.english: Do not light a fire in any of your dwellings on the Sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 當安息日，不可在你們一切的住處生火。

sentences.english: Mr. Paterno spoke to students who gathered in front of his house after his firing.
sentences.chinese: 帕特諾先生髮言的學生聚集在他家門前經過他的生火。

sentences.english: They build small fires in the sterns, grilling crustaceans and boiling thin mollusc stews.
sentences.chinese: 他們在船尾生火啓竈，或炙烤海貝，或煮燉海鮮。

sentences.english: Graham was in his element, building a fire and cooking the steaks.
sentences.chinese: 格林厄姆生火和做牛排都很拿手。

sentences.english: Dipa Ma learned to cook food by making the fire element come out of her hands.
sentences.chinese: 蒂帕嬤學會了用她的手產生火元素來生火做飯。

sentences.english: Then someone knew there was a wooden pavilion so the soldiers destroyed and used it to make a fire.
sentences.chinese: 有人想起後院有一木製井亭，乃領人拆而生火取暖。

definition: to light a fire for cooking
to drill wood to make fire
to warm oneself at a fire
